p: The quality assessment of the sequence reads generated was performed using Fastqc v0.11.2 [ 50]. The FASTX_toolkit [ 51] and SolexaQA [ 52] were used for the removal of adapters and poor quality sequences. De novo assembly of the reads was performed using Trinity v2.2.1 [ 53]. Assembled sequences were then blasted against a locally installed plant virus database using BLASTN 2.2.30+, TBLASTX 2.2.30+ [ 54]. Identities of the viruses present in each sample were visualized using Krona [ 21]. Reference mapping was performed for individual samples against the most similar reference genome downloaded from NCBI, using CLC Genomics Workbench 5.5.1 software (Qiagen, Germany).
